ingredients.ingredient: 2 (3.4 ounce) packages JELL-O Lemon Flavor Instant Pudding
1 (6 ounce) HONEY MAID Graham Pie Crust
1 (8 ounce) tub COOL WHIP Whipped Topping, thawed, divided

cookingTips: Layer pudding, whipped topping, and more pudding for visual appeal and texture contrast
Chill pie for at least 2 hours before serving to set the layers properly
Use cold milk for pudding to ensure it sets quickly without lumps
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do I create distinct, even layers in this dessert without them blending together?
